bill_title: Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Girls and Boys Cross Country Teams.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Girls and Boys Cross Country Teams. WHEREAS, the Lennox girls and boys cross country teams took fourth and fifth place at state, respectively, and both teams put forth hard work and dedication all season; and WHEREAS, after leading the pack all season, Ali Bainbridge earned the 2019 State A individual championship title and helped lead the girls team alongside Emily Plucker, Kelsey Schmidt, Esther Chirstion, Graycee Postma, and Sierra Smidt whose performances led to a fourth-place finish for the Orioles; and WHEREAS, the Orioles boys team was led by Sam Swanson who placed 19th and helped lead the team to a fifth place finish: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends the Lennox Orioles High School Girls and Boys Cross Country Teams on a great season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending the Lennox Orioles High School Girls and Boys Cross Country Teams. WHEREAS, the Lennox girls and boys cross country teams took fourth and fifth place at state, respectively, and both teams put forth hard work and dedication all season; and WHEREAS, after leading the pack all season, Ali Bainbridge earned the 2019 State A individual championship title and helped lead the girls team alongside Emily Plucker, Kelsey Schmidt, Esther Chirstion, Graycee Postma, and Sierra Smidt whose performances led to a fourth-place finish for the Orioles; and WHEREAS, the Orioles boys team was led by Sam Swanson who placed 19th and helped lead the team to a fifth place finish: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends the Lennox Orioles High School Girls and Boys Cross Country Teams on a great season.
